EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-03-26-Partner Town Hall April 2018.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic Product Release: Partner Pre-Brief Webinar - You're Invited!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
Turbonomic has a new release right around the corner!
As a trusted partner, we would like to pre-brief you on the features of Turbonomic's next release prior to the external announcement.
We’ll be sharing details and demos about our great new capabilities, including hot topics such as public cloud and containers, that help drive differentiated services and sales plays for Turbonomic partners.
Please join our live webinar on Wednesday April 4th at 1 p.m. ET <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-partner-townhall-april18/]]> for a behind-the-scenes look at Turbonomic’s upcoming release.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-partner-townhall-april18/]]>
We look forward to seeing you there! - The Turbonomic Team
